Awright...
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Monster Types: Hare: Awright...
By Jello on Friday, September 1, 2000 - 02:17 pm:

If you have read the 'Jello Says "Jells Can Go
Either Way!"' post, then you know I was gonna
mix Mudd with a Rocky Fur. So I tried to train
the rocky Fur, and so much stuff happened in
between (Yugoslavia, Final Fantasy, Legend
of Dragoon), that I put down MR2 and just
recently finished the Fur. Actually, hes waiting
in the freezerfor the Legends Cup. He
is first generation off a CD that my mom
brought me from the library, and I just kept him
because I'd never trained a Hare before.
(Nats gave me a bad impression). So he was
in the freezer, waiting his turn, when...

20 Years Later...

He was brought out to be mixed with Mudd, my
Muddy Jell, to make a possible champion Jell
that would make the Hall and stay there...

Turns out I've got a champ anyway. With 950+
Power, 600+Skill, and 700+Speed, I whipped
thru the M4 and now I am waiting for Most.

*Cringe* Why do I always get Most?
I've never even seen Poritoka!

Anyway, more info on the monster after
tennis...
